data.eml:eml: A new species of Speleogobius (Teleostei: Gobiidae) from the Western Mediterraenean Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kovačić, Marcelo, Ordines, Francesc, Schliewen, Ulrich K. (2016): A new species of Speleogobius (Teleostei: Gobiidae) from the Western Mediterraenean Sea. Zootaxa 4066 (3): 301-310, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4066.3.6
